gallery.txt_info_1_title: Select a single photo of yourself
gallery.txt_info_1_description: Your face should be clearly visible, neutral, sufficiently large, well-lit, and centered.
gallery.txt_info_2_description: No group photos, no nudity, no animals, minimal accessories, no funny faces.

1.title: Welcome to ReFaceAI
1.sub_btn_text: By pressing the 'Start' button, you accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use

2.title: Choose a model
2.description: Browse categories and choose from a wide variety of scenes.

3.title: Select a photo
3.description: Take a photo of yourself, or select an existing image from your gallery.

4.title: Admire your realistic avatar!
4.description: And share the stunning result with your friends on social media.
